author: bingomanatee
content:
The view template in the [[actions:Action folder]] that an action renders through. 

It is an HTML template, named `view.html` or `[action_name]_view.html`. View templates are [EJS](https://github.com/visionmedia/ejs) files.

Note that the action file only "kicks in" if the [[action_script:Action script]] calls `on_output`. rs.send() sends your data raw as JSON and sidesteps any postprocessing, including the template and any [[view_helpers:View Helpers]]. 

Note that you are not restricted to just putting static and objects into the template; you can pass functions as well, and many existing view helpers do just that.
